body:
For the curious people out there, the plot:
The guy has two secrets, he has the ability to read people's minds and he's a die-hard fan of a famous male model (but swears not to be gay). He works in a host club because he thinks his ability can make him rich in such a place.
 One day he stumbles upon his idol, and conveniently offers him a ride to where the guy was headed to. The idol notices our MC knows him, and lightly hits on the MC.
Our MC then goes to work, can't stop thinking about his idol, but still swears not to be gay. MC sends Idol a "haha, I'm that guy from a few days ago, you free?" message inviting him for dinner. It becomes obvious that MC is a lot into him. The idol then starts to have many kinky thoughts, which are all read by the MC, and that's it.
 Let's hope ch2 has some real action.
I don’t get what’s going on, but I want more.
